[DQC.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement 1003004 - Statement - Consolidated balance sheet includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:Liabilities of 2,769,241,000,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 1,100,150,000,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2021-06-30 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:Liabilities that should add to 2,769,241,000,000 are comprised of the following:
+ AccrualsDeferredIncomeAndOtherLiabilities 164,800,000,000 + CurrencyNotesInCirculation 41,880,000,000 + LiabilitiesArisingFromInsuranceContractsGross 110,572,000,000 + CurrentTaxLiabilities 929,000,000 + DebtSecurities 84,218,000,000 + DeferredTaxLiabilities 4,338,000,000 + DepositsFromBanks 100,448,000,000 + DerivativeFinancialLiabilities 200,156,000,000 + FinancialLiabilitiesAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossClassifiedAsHeldForTrading 89,637,000,000 + FinancialLiabilitiesAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossDesignatedAsUponInitialRecognition 151,686,000,000 + ItemsInCourseOfTransmissionToOtherBanks 15,100,000,000 + OtherProvisions 2,814,000,000 + RepurchaseAgreementsAndCashCollateralOnSecuritiesLent 112,798,000,000 + SubordinatedLiabilities 20,774,000,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for 1003004 - Statement - Consolidated balance sheet. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:Liabilities Total Value : 2,769,241,000,000 Total period : 2021-06-30 Dimensions : Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 17.0.0RC2 - https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1089113/000162828021015125/hsbc-20210630.htm 4

[DQC.IFRS.0127.9596] The statement 1003004 - Statement - Consolidated balance sheet includes the concept ifrs-full:LoansAndAdvancesToCustomers in the presentation tree. The filing does not include a dimensional structure for this statement. The filing does not include a default value for this presentation item ifrs-full:LoansAndAdvancesToCustomers but does include dimensionalized values for this element of the following:
1,148,000,000, 216,098,000,000, 350,945,000,000, 491,320,000,000, 1,059,511,000,000, 1,059,511,000,000
If the dimensionalized value appears in the financial statements, then a dimension needs to be added to the report. If the item has no value on the financial statements, then the presentation item should be removed from the financial statements.
Total Element : ifrs-full:LoansAndAdvancesToCustomers Total period : 2021-06-30 Dimensions : ifrs-full:SegmentConsolidationItemsAxis=ifrs-full:OperatingSegmentsMember, ifrs-full:SegmentsAxis=hsbc:RetailBankingAndWealthManagementMember
Rule Element Id:9596 Rule version: 17.0.0RC2 - http://xbrl.ifrs.org/taxonomy/2020-03-16/full_ifrs/full_ifrs-cor_2020-03-16.xsd 3641

If the dimensionalized value appears in the financial statements, then a dimension needs to be added to the report. If the item has no value on the financial statements, then the presentation item should be removed from the financial statements.

[DQC.IFRS.0127.9596] The statement 1003004 - Statement - Consolidated balance sheet includes the concept ifrs-full:Assets in the presentation tree. The filing does not include a dimensional structure for this statement. The filing does not include a default value for this presentation item ifrs-full:Assets but does include dimensionalized values for this element of the following:
9,214,000,000, 19,405,000,000, 21,685,000,000, 92,726,000,000, 143,030,000,000, 180,790,000,000, 624,042,000,000, 912,479,000,000, 1,258,694,000,000, 2,976,005,000,000
If the dimensionalized value appears in the financial statements, then a dimension needs to be added to the report. If the item has no value on the financial statements, then the presentation item should be removed from the financial statements.
